package.name: apple-symbols
package.author: Joshua Hall
package.description: Few more or less Apple specific symbols often used in technical writing
package.title: Apple Symbols

manifest.name: apple-symbols
manifest.title: Apple Symbols
manifest.description: Few more or less Apple specific symbols often used in technical writing
manifest.author: Joshua Hall

value.readme:
# Espanso Accented Words

Simple package to extend [Espanso](https://espanso.org) with symbols for non-printable keys used in shortcuts and similar situations. These are typically used in technical writing, help documents, etc.

## Installation

```
espanso install apple-symbols
```

## Usage

Expansions available include...

* :alt > ⌥
* :bs > ⌫
* :cmd > ⌘
* :ctrl > ⌃
* :shift > ⇧
* :tab > ⇥
* :cap > ⇪
* :eject > ⏏︎
* :esc > ␛

## Contributions

Contributions are welcome. Feel free to fork and submit PRs with additional words to add to this list.

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
# Apple Symbols

matches:
  - triggers: [":alt", ":opt"]
    replace: "⌥"

  - trigger: ":bs"
    replace: "⌫"

  - trigger: ":cmd"
    replace: "⌘"

  - trigger: ":ctrl"
    replace: "⌃"

  - trigger: ":shift"
    replace: "⇧"

  - trigger: ":tab"
    replace: "⇥"

  - trigger: ":cap"
    replace: "⇪"

  - trigger: ":eject"
    replace: "⏏︎"

  - trigger: ":esc"
    replace: "␛"
